text: @SecPompeo When asked if the Coronavirus was a hoax you couldn’t or wouldn’t answer it. Let me answer that for you....NO IT IS NOT A HOAX. Have you not looked at the world map of infection?  It’s very clearly laid out for you and changes hourly.
